doc.after: Education in Italy is free and mandatory from ages six to sixteen 189 and consists of five stages kindergarten scuola dell infanzia primary school scuola primaria lower secondary school scuola secondaria di primo grado upper secondary school scuola secondaria di secondo grado and university universit 190 The Superior Graduate Schools are independent institutions similar to French Grandes coles which offer advanced training and research through university type courses or are dedicated to teaching at graduate or post doctoral level
